Interface EventRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JpaEventRepository

    public interface EventRepository
    Event repository interface
    Author:
    Michael Joseph Walsh

      Returns the Event for the given id

    • Method Detail

      • getById

        Event getById(Long id)
        Returns the Event for the given id
        Parameters:
        id - id the id of the Event
        Returns:
        a valid Event if it exists, null otherwise

      • getEventsDuringPeriod

        Collection<Event> getEventsDuringPeriod(Date start,
                                      Date end,
                                      int startChunk,
                                      int chunkSize)
        Returns the Events for a given Date range
        Parameters:
        start - the Date to start from
        end - the Date to end at
        startChunk - the start chuck of a list you desire
        chunkSize - the size of the chunk you desire
        Returns:
        a Collection of Events

      • remove

        void remove(Event event)
        Removes the given Event from the repository
        Parameters:
        event - the Event object to remove

      • removeById

        void removeById(Long id)
        Removes an Event from the repository
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Event to remove

      • save

        Event save(Event event)
        Persists a Event
        Parameters:
        event - the Event to be saved
        Returns:
